entry.title: $2634 // penthouse 2bed with private roofdeck
entry.content:
No Fee.
RENT DIRECTLY FROM THE LANDLORD!!!
Current Incentives:
Now offering net effective rents on 12 and 189 month leases.
One month free rent on a 12 month lease, or
Two months free rent on a 18 month lease

Small penthouse unit, two true bedrooms one bath with private roofdeck. Available for February 1st. Queen Sized Bedrooms. Photos are of a similar unit in the same floor in the same building.⭐️Small apartment, so if you're in search of a large apartment, then this isn't it.
⭐️When responding please write "small 106th penthouse" in the subject line.

$2634 a month on a 18 month lease
or
$2704 a month on 12 month lease.

No Broker's Fee! I am a broker for the landlord and property management, I don't charge a fee!
  • Heat and Hot Water is included in the rent.
    Gross rent is $2995. Price above is net effective (rounded to the nearest dollar) and that's what will be due each month, depending on the lease term you choose.
    Available for:immediate occupancy. Viewing by appointment only.
    Available for viewing:
  • Call or text. Serious inquiries only, please. AND NO BROKERS!
    Apartment Amenities and Features:
  • Dishwasher. Washer Dryer inside the apartment. Microwave. Stainless Steel appliances. Hardwood Floors, Crown Moldings, Exposed Brick Walls, 100% Pet Friendly, (No pet fee/app/deposit.) Walk up building, no elevator.
    private roofdeck
    Rent directly from the Landlord.
  • No Fee. No middle man. Direct communication with property managers, leasing managers, landlord.
    Our no fee portfolio ranges from UWS to LES.
  • Interested in other areas, other apartments? I have other no fee apartments ranging from studios to 4+ bedroom apartments. If interested, please include in your response.
    Photos are of actual unit, unless otherwise noted above. No Floor Plan is available. Bedrooms are able to accommodate a Queen sized bed or larger. Pictures are representative of quality and type of renovation not an indication of size or layout.
    If incentive is listed, incentives are subject to change and /or end at anytime, with or without notice.
    NOTE:
  • The Applicant(s) must have combined verifiable income of 40x the monthly rent or greater. Assets are not factored into qualifications. Incomes are combined if need be.
  • All Applicants must have been with their current employer for a minimum of 6 months.
  • All must have good credit (Management runs all credit reports and are the sole judges of the report).
    • Failure to qualify on any of these terms will require the use of a fully qualified Guarantor.
      • The Guarantor(s) must have combined verifiable income of 60x the monthly rent or greater, as well as good credit.
      • The maximum number of Guarantors for a Lease may not exceed the number of Applicants.
      • Guarantors must reside in either USA, or CANADA.
    If an Applicant cannot satisfy any of the above, alternative approaches may then be explored.
    Ready to Apply...eventually?
  • Funds needed to apply: One month's rent for security deposit (gross rent amount), then Due at lease signing is first month (rent effective rent amount), and Application fee, which is fully disclosed below.
    Thank you,
    Allan Acosta, Licensed Real Estate Salesperson
    9300 Realty, Inc. Licensed Real Estate Brokerage
    To view the apartment, to ask for the availability of this apartment, reply to this ad with a formal introduction, including your name, which ad you are inquiring about, phone number, and email address. or call my office phone at (212)228-9300 extension 310, or call/text my direct number at (848)333-3880 SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY! AND NO BROKERS!!!

    East Harlem 106th
